title: How large is the OCE player base?
body: Just wondering how many active players are on this server for a small project of mine. Doesn't need to be hard numbers but a close approximation will be helpful. Thanks :)

replies.body: Not enough to warrant Rito to treat us like a real server.

There are approximately 125,000 ranked accounts on OCE this season.

http://oce.op.gg/statistics/tier/

Some might be smurfs and no doubt there are plenty of unranked and below level 30 players. So who knows exactly.

Riot also have an infographic that is probably a little out of date by now, but can be useful: http://majorleagueoflegends.s3.amazonaws.com/lol_infographic.png

As an added to this, you have to realize that a lot of people are unranked and waiting for solo queue to arrive before they do any games, i think last season we had around 250,000 but this also is probably a decent amount of smurfs and whatnot, you'd have to get the numbers from riot to know individual people.
